title: birthday wishes for herr spiekermann
content:
birthday wishes to the man that gave us [Meta™](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043343/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11025.5.21&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=happy+birthday%2C+herr+spiekermann%21&sampleSize=18), plus so much more.

herr spiekermann this thread's for you!
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Happy Birthday, Erik!

Had I known I would have baked a parrot! ;-)

Love & kisses,  
Norbert

i may not know you personally, but i believe you've influenced us all who engage in the pursuit of type design. thank you for all you've done for our community, and hope this day is a happy one for you!
Happy Birthday, Erik!

Thank you for increasing our Metabolism and for your Info, we are all wishing you happy birthday here around the officina. You are our type of guy so letter rip for another year at least!:-)

ChrisL
Herzliche Glückwünsche zum Geburtstag und alles gute, Herr Spiekermann!

What I love about Herr Spiekermann is that as busy as he is, he still takes time to kick down some knowledge to peeps like us. How many big names are active participants on Typophile? Not many.

Thank you for your contributions to fontdom, Erik!
Happy B-Day for having such a cool name !

HBD + Many More!

hhp
Best Wishes for a happy and productive new year!

happy birthday erik!  
best wishes.
Joyeux anniversaire mon cher Erik.
Happy birthday, Erik. Your contributions to Typophile help make the Internet a better place.
Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum Geburtstag Erik! Vielen Dank für deine netten und interessanten Beiträge.

HBD ES!

CC

Happy birthday, Erik!

I think we're all a bit more 'humanist' because of your work. I know I am.

Erik, we need to stop running into each other in airports.

Ich weiß, daß mein Deutsch nicht gutes, aber alles gute zum geburtstag irgendwie ist!

_SpiekerBirthday_

Thank you, everyone, for your birthday wishes. I was, of course, traveling on the day and didn’t get a chance to write back immediately.

I'm back in Berlin now and will hopefully have a bit more time for appearances on Typophile.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lovehelvetica_4021.jpg)

Happy birthday!

I'll never forget the time we met. Me trying to sell my first FB fonts to whoever the heck you were, and you trying to stuff 1000 adobe fonts into an actual suitcase for the European grey market, ahhhh, the good old days in Old San Antone (sic).

All the best and sorry this type is so crappy ;)
Happy Birthday, Erik. Thanks for ... well ... being you. :^)
Happy Birthday Erik! I hope you do have more time on typophile now. That would be great!
Happy Birthday, Erik!
Happy Belated Birthday, fellow Mayborn!
Happy Birthday, Erik!
Happy Belated Birthday, Erik! It was a pleasure meeting you last summer.
I am too late in this, but Happy birth day Herr spiekermann!
